subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)

Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Florida Gulf Coast men’s basketball team grabbed a piece of the national spotlight before their first appearance in the N.C.A.A. tournament, if only for eight seconds.
